backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing the HRMS backend with role-based access control, user profiles, employee records, onboarding tasks, goals, performance cycles, and reviews using in-memory Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented HRMS features (auth, employees, onboarding, performance) to frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files, describing their responsibilities across authentication, layout, employee management, onboarding, performance, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, color system, and light/dark theme variables for the HRMS portal.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React application and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application wiring authentication, profile setup flow, layout, routing via TanStack Router, theming, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen UI that initiates Internet Identity authentication and shows branded loading and status states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting first-time users to create their basic profile and saving it via backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/employees/Employ: Modal dialog component for creating or editing an employee profile, managing form state and submitting via create/update employee query hooks.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Presentational component that displays an access denied message with an icon and a button to navigate back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout providing header, navigation, responsive sidebar, and logout handling, with navigation items filtered by admin status.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Editor component for creating, editing, and assigning onboarding tasks to an employee, including dynamic task lists and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/components/performance/Goal: Dialog component for adding new performance goals or updating goal progress and status, supporting both controlled and triggered open states.
frontend/src/components/performance/Revi: Component rendering self, manager, and HR review editors with role-based access and submission via corresponding review mutation hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook to manage Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity persistence, and login status tracking using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a large set of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data (users, employees, onboarding tasks, goals, reviews, roles) via the actor, with caching, invalidation, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including colors, layout tokens, and global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app, wiring up React Query and Internet Identity providers and importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Implements the main dashboard UI showing personalized welcome text, onboarding progress, and quick navigation cards based on employee data and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/employees/EmployeeDet: Displays detailed information for a single employee, including personal and employment details, with edit capabilities gated by admin permissions.
frontend/src/pages/employees/EmployeeDir: Admin-only page for searching, listing, and creating employees, featuring a searchable table, loading states, and access control.
frontend/src/pages/employees/MyProfilePa: Renders the logged-in employeeâ€™s profile by fetching their employee ID and details, showing loading and empty states. Displays personal information, job details, start date, and employment status using cards and badges.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Admin-only page for managing onboarding tasks, allowing selection of an employee from a list. Renders an onboarding task editor for the selected employee and blocks access for non-admin users.

Employee-facing onboarding page that lists assigned onboarding tasks, shows overall progress, and allows task status updates. Handles loading, empty-task states, overdue detection, and progress visualization.
frontend/src/pages/performance/GoalsPage: Displays performance goals for the current employee, with admins able to select other employees and add goals. Shows goal status, progress, and handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/performance/ReviewsPa: Manages performance reviews and review cycles, with admin capabilities to create cycles and reviews for employees. Supports employee selection, cycle selection, and displays reviews with dialogs for creation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from query strings or hash routes and persisting them in sessionStorage. Includes helpers for storing, retrieving, clearing, and sanitizing URL/session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling class-based dark mode, scanning frontend sources, and extending the theme with OKLCH-based design tokens, custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and UI primitives for an HRMS design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an HRMS portal, including schema/versioning and a list of implemented features covering authentication with roles, employee data management, onboarding, performance modules, navigation structure, and visual theming.
